remarks: Define the set of states on a Hilbert lattice.  Definition of [Kalmbach] p. 266.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
df-st $p |- States = { f e. ( ( 0 [,] 1 ) ^m CH ) | ( ( f ` ~H ) = 1 /\ A. x e. CH A. y e. CH ( x C_ ( _|_ ` y ) -> ( f ` ( x vH y ) ) = ( ( f ` x ) + ( f ` y ) ) ) ) } $.
$d f x y $.
